title: FS: T202 Cobb PSA 8 - no longer available

posts.post_title: FS: T202 Cobb PSA 8 - no longer available
posts.post_content:
For Sale: T202 Good Play at Third - Moriarity / Cobb with Black Factory 30 back PSA 8.  Focused, well-centered Ty Cobb with an extremely difficult back variation.  Sharp corners are worthy of the PSA grade - beautiful tobacco piece.  Price: $23k.  Please direct all inquiries to [url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url].  Thank you.  No longer available. 

John
